description:
Are you trying to loose weight? Weight Log will help you keep track of your progress & show you at a glance how you've done.

- A large clear and beautiful chart showing your progress
- Support for US, metric and imperial units
- Enter a target weight to see at a glance how close you are to your goal
- Easily track your BMI along with your weight (Visible if you enter your height in preferences)
- Supports synchronizing with a free or premium skinnyr.com account. All of your weights will be stored on skinnyr.com so that you can view them on your web os device, or on your computer. (Not required)
